slides.message:
Hey, it's me, Clippy!

It looks like you are in need of some assistance.

Would you like some help?

Are you sure about that?

You're kinda f*cked without me right now, bro.

Great choice!

Hold on, fetching Shout Outs...

I was able to fetch the Shout Outs.

Would you like me to display them?

I want to be Linda when I grow up (ignoring that I'm older than her). She is truly a kind and benevolent leader who runs Calgary with an iron fist. Someone who is still around should definitely nominate her for CMVP.
Looks like those are all the Shout Outs!
